name: Space Shmup!
description:
directions:

use arrow keys to move your space ship!

hit the enemies with "space" key.

-------

music credits:

Opening scene, Main scene, and Winning scene bgm comes from Marvel Land Sega (1989)

--------

Description:

This is assignment 3 for Unity Spring '22. This game is a space shump featuring an opening scene, a main scene, a lost scene, and a winning scene. 

There are other ships coming toward the player as "enemies." Players have 5 lives and will lose one life if get hit by the enemy. Player also gets 1 score point when shooting one enemy down. When the score reaches 10, the player wins.
